title: Thunderbird, merge TB email, contacts, etc on PC to TB on MacBook.
content:
I must move all my personal emails from my Thunderbird email on my work PC to my personal Thunderbird email on my MacBook. I would like to combine them and have access to all at once.

I have moved all my personal emails on my work PC into one folder labeled “Personal.”

I would be ok moving the personal emails to the local TB drive on Mac if recommended.

All I can seem to find when I search the knowledge base is how to move Thunderbird from old to new. And in those instructions they overwrite the profile on new. I am already actively using Thunderbird on my Mac so what I must do is merge pc TB to Mac TB but I have not been able to find instructions. It’s been a long time since I’ve been on a Mac so I’m re-teaching myself. I’m much more fluent on the PC right now.

For me there is nothing that compares to Thunderbird. I’ve been using TB for 25 years and have not found anything that compares.

Thank you for you assistance!
creator: lisabauer

title: Organize your messages with filters
content:
On the "Organize your messages with filters" page, it describes how to create a filter, but doesn't describe what can be entered into the "value" field. Simple text strings are shown. Are the entries restricted to text strings, or are there special characters? Can hexadecimal values be entered?

The reason I'm asking is that I am receiving many emails where the "From:" address ends with ".za.-com". I haven't been able to get a filter to recognize that. Is the "-" (hyphen) a special or prohibited character? Is there a means of recognizing that string at the end of an email address?

Thanx!

PacemakerPete
creator: PacemakerPete

title: Is/Could it possible to pin 'Favourites' in Thunderbird?
content: I can't find a way to pin my 'Favourites' panel in Thunderbird. If it's not possible, then this can be regarded as a feature request. I have a few (4) definite 'Favourites' in my list, which I regularly have to move messages to. Since I have several email accounts, some of which have largish folder trees, I often scroll down to a different account, find I need to move a message to a 'Favourite' and then have to scroll all the way back up to locate the folder. In fact, I often go to the folder directly, rather than go all the way back to 'Favourites'. Making the idea of 'Favourites' a little redundant. Outlook has a simple 'Pin Favourites' feature that keeps the pane visible, even if the other folders are scrolled down. I find this incredibly useful, and would really like this ability in Thunderbird.
creator: bigthicko

title: Problem with showing message on thunderbird app
content: Once I press on the message on thunderbird app it doesn't open on right side of the app like it used to do before. Please let me know how to fix this problem.

title: Download posta con Thunderbird
content: Da quando ho installato Norton anti-virus, per scaricare la posta in Thunderbird devo cliccare "Conferma eccezione di sicurezza" nella finestra "Aggiungi eccezione di sicurezza". Sul mio PC è installato Windows 7. La versione di Thunderbird è 115.18.0 (32 bit) Grazie. Carlo

title: Failure to send emails through Thunderbird on my desktop
content:
I am no longer able to send emails through Thunderbird on my desktop computer. When I try, I receive the following message:

"Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending the mail. The server responded: <graham.dadd@thewalnut.org.uk>: Recipient address rejected: Access denied. Please check the message recipient graham.dadd@thewalnut.org.uk and try again."

I have tried twice to resolve the issue with my internet service provider Fasthosts who have checked all my server settings etc and, by using tests involving webmail, they assure me that the root of the problem does not lie with them. They advised me to approach you next for help with resolution.

Please can you help, regards, Graham.

title: Maycon douglas transmissão em mídia
content:
"Minha experiência com criptomoedas foi verdadeiramente única e incrível. Entrei nesse universo com curiosidade e logo percebi o enorme potencial de transformação que ele oferece, tanto em termos financeiros quanto tecnológicos. Pude explorar como a blockchain revoluciona a forma de realizar transações, trazendo mais transparência, descentralização e inovação. Cada etapa foi um aprendizado fascinante, desde acompanhar as tendências do mercado até entender a importância da segurança digital. Foi uma jornada cheia de descobertas, crescimento e, sem dúvida, uma experiência inesquecível."

Se precisar ajustar algo ou deixar mais personalizada, é só dizer!
creator: MDS

title: Local Folders path keep disappearing after reboot
content: Hi, hope to get some support here for my problem. I did recently the upgrade to Ubuntu 24.04 and since then Thunderbird is a Snap package. Thunderbird works fine, as before, the only thing is that after a reboot of the system the path to the local folders storage is set to a default path. I can adjust this to the right path via account settings (my local folders are on a Synology NAS), en then restart TB but it is annoying having to do that every time. Does anyone know of a more permanent solution? Any help much appreciated!

content:
Hello,

I have an email on several computers: office@company-aaa.com. Configuration via IMAP but TAG synchronization does not work for me. The first TAG works for me: Important (red color, shortcut button with key no. 1). But the rest do not synchronize. Generally, I use about 20 tags, but one more tag also synchronizes but incorrectly, (the third with the ninth on another computer).

I looked through the prefs.js file, but I do not see any connections or reasons why it does not work. How to manage this so that all Tags work? Please help, it will make my daily work in the team much easier. Regards. Grzegorz

title: Scarlet mailbox dient overgezet naar de informaticasystemen van Proximus
content: Voor de overzetting naar de informaticasystemen van Proximus vraagt Scarlet om de aanmeldingsinstellingen in de bestaande account te vervangen (ik gebruik POP): 1) Inkomende server : URL, poort en verbindingsbeveiliging heb ik gewijzigd : GEEN probleem, ik ontvang nog steeds e-mails. 2) Uitgaande server : URL heb ik (zoals gevraagd door Scarlet) gewijzigd naar relay.scarlet.be, poort naar 587 en verbindingsbeveiliging naar STARTTLS. IK KAN ECHTER GEEN MAILS MEER VERZENDEN ! Ik krijg het volgende venster : "Wachtwoord voor uitgaande (SMTP-)server relay.scarlet.be vereist" Als ik dan mijn bestaand wachtwoord invul krijg ik het venster : "Aanmelding bij account 'Scarlet' mislukt - Aanmelden bij server relay.scarlet.be met gebruikersnaam ...(mijn gebruikersnaam wordt hier vermeld) is mislukt" (Vraag ook voorgelegd aan Scarlet maar na 3 weken nog geen oplossing)
creator: hugo.decorte

title: Disable "link mistmatch"
content:
My work uses a 3rd party URL "defense" program, so every link that comes to me via e-mail is sent to that "defense" 3rd party, instead of directly.

The Thunderbird "link mistmatch" then activates *every time* I have links at work.

Looking online there *used* to be: 

 mail.phishing.detection.mismatched_hosts

but it does not work any more.

None of the "phishing" settings prevent the link mismatch from appearing. I could not find any other "mismatch" settings.

How can I avoid this horrible annoyance???

Alvar

title: Przekroczono limit czasu połączenia z serwerem
content: Proszę o informację. Kiedy wysyłam maile podczas pracy w biurze jest wszystko w porządku maila są odbierane i wysyłane. Kiedy próbuję wysłać maile będąc połączonym z internetem w domu lub internetem bezprzewodowym, lub udostępniam go z telefonu to maile nie są wysyłane i jest komunikat Przekroczono limit czasu połączenia z serwerem. Co mam zrobić jeszcze w tamtym roku nie było tego problemu. Nie jest to problem programu antywirusowego ponieważ na próbę go wyłączałem. Wersja Thunderbir 128.8.0esr (32 bity)

title: Disappearing Sent Folder
content:
My Sent folder disappeared. How do I restore the folder with the sent messages still intact. Or, at the least, just restore an empty Sent folder. The In-Box, Drafts, and Trash are still there.

All the settings are correct, and it seems that because there's no Sent folder I cannot send an email. When I try to send a message I get the attached Error.

My local phone company routes email through Yahoo Mail, then to Thunderbird. It was all working fine until my Sent folder disappeared. Now because of the missing Sent folder I have to create the email message in Thunderbird saving it in Drafts so I have a record. Then, I have to copy it and send it from Yahoo Mail. Needless to say this is a pain in the you know what.

Can someone please provide the instructions to get my Sent folder back?

Thanks,

Tess

title: How to Change Default Threading Mode in Thunderbird
content: New folders created in the 128.8.0esr (64-bit) version of Thunderbird are set to "Threaded" even with the configuration of “mailnews.default_view_flags” value set to “0” for Unthreaded.

title: Thunderbird email
content:
I am trying to activate Thunderbird email, but have been unable to do so. I have followed the instructions provided here, but when it comes to signing in to Yahoo mail, I am unable to because I do not have a cell phone; only a landline with no bell and whistles, just the basics.

I am definitely not computer literate and am at a loss as to what my next step should be. At present, it seems as though I am receiving emails, but am unable to send any.

Once I get my Thunderbird email set up properly, will my emails still identify as @yahoo.com or as @Thunderbird.com? I would prefer the latter. My family and most friends would be happy with that, and might even bring you more business.

Thank you for the patience you have shown me in this matter. I apologize for my lack of knowledge in matters of technology but, at eighty-two, I didn't think I would need to know about these things.

Carolyne Lain, lakeshorelunch@yahoo.com
creator: Chenoa43
